name: BustingShapes
description:
BustingShapes!

Warning... May contain basic geometric mathematics (not really)


Consume the Shapes

By collecting shapes and adding the some of their internal angles to your own you can change your own shape. You may want to be a different shape. How should I know your motivations?

Use the Power of Shapes

Each shape has a different ability, you may want to be able to do different stuff in which case you may need to change your shape.

Achieve something... 

Probably get to the end of the level (TBC)...
